title: The White House Releases the Official Portraits of President Donald J. Trump and Vice President Mike Pence â€“ The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			
Issued on:
October 31, 2017
The White House today announces the release of the official portraits of President Donald J. Trump and Vice President Mike Pence. Produced by the U.S. Government Publishing Office (GPO), the photographs will be distributed to Federal facilities across the country and made available for sale to the public.
